HOME.LEAD: Typing speed and accuracy test using Wikipedia articles!
HOME.TITLE: Welcome to ngType Tester

CONFIGURATION.LEAD: The application is broken into user configurations and application wide settings.
CONFIGURATION.REMOVE_ASCII_INFO: Removing non-ASCII characters is generally advised for English speaking users. For users attempting this test where Unicode characters are used in their supported language you should disable this functionality.
CONFIGURATION.WIKIPEDIA_INFO: This URL is used to pull random text for your test. It can be adjusted as needed.

RESULTS.LEAD: Start taking tests to track your results.

TEST.INSTRUCTIONS: Your test is ready to begin. When you start typing the timer will begin.
TEST.INSTRUCTIONS_2: The test will stop when you click the 'Stop' button or the same number of characters have been entered.
TEST.LEAD: To start the test press the button below. Your typing test text will then appear. The timer will be begin when you start typing.

USER_LOGON.CANT_FIND_EMAIL: Unable to find a user with this email!
USER_LOGON.EMAIL_NOTICE: We'll never share your email with anyone else.
USER_LOGON.LEAD: Registering allows all of your tests to be stored. The system will track your best scores and average WPM.
USER_LOGON.RETURNING_USER: Coming back? Enter your email to log-in!
